name: Wind Weasel
description: The Wind Weasel is a medium-sized fey that can shift between a small weasel form and a whirlwind form, showcasing a unique duality. It is characterized by its ability to move through tight spaces and evade attacks.
memorable: Its ability to disguise itself as a dust devil makes it a challenging foe to detect before it strikes.
goals: To confuse and elude enemies while striking quickly and retreating.
relations: Often associated with other chaotic fey creatures or nature spirits.
environment: Commonly found in forests, glades, or areas filled with natural wind currents.
strengths: Excels in stealth, mobility, and multi-target damage with its whirlwind abilities.
weaknesses: Has lower defenses with an armor class of 13 and relies heavily on evasion.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack with a bite and scythe claw, plus a devastating Whirling Leaves action in whirlwind form.
most_powerful_ability: Whirling Leaves allows it to deal damage to all creatures in its space, potentially impacting multiple opponents.
skills: Possesses strong stealth and dexterity saving throws, making it hard to track and hit.
additional_information: Can occupy a hostile creature's space without hindrance.
Immunity to effects that would restrain or grapple it while in whirlwind form.
Hidden In The Wind ability makes it hard to detect unless enemies succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence check.
Shapechanger ability allows it to revert back to its true form as a bonus action.
Windy Speed ability lets it resist the effects of the slow spell.
